chargeHist.descr: Operate with Restricted Controlled Substance (5th or 6th)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Kenneth E. Galloway was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • OWI (5th or 6th), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 2 years prison with credit for 85 days time served

superMiscConds.notes: Fine $1444.00   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

DNA Surcharge $250.00   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Absolute sobriety/No alcohol/drug use without valid Rx.  Submit DNA sample and pay surcharge.  Take medication as prescribed and only as prescribed.  No inhalants unless DOC approves.
AODA assessment  within 45 days and follow-through with recommendations

supervisions.notes:
COURT:  5 years prison: 2 years in custody 85 days credit time served - 3 years ES - conditions of ES: no inhalents unless approved by DOC - AODA and any follow thru - absolute sobriety - Fine $1694.00 -DNA sample & Surcharge - Eligible for earned release -  DL revoked 36 months - IID on all vehicles owned by defendant for 36 months plus 2 years -  any counseling - take medications as prescribed only as prescribed
Counts 2, 3 and 4 are dismissed and read-in along with count 2 in 15 CF 172. 15 CF 129, 14 CF 172,15 CF 201, 15 CF 248 and 15 CF 262
IID for 36 months plus 2 years   On any vehicle owned or operated.
